title: CrashChat: A Multimodal Large Language Model for Multitask Traffic Crash Video Analysis
summary: Automating crash video analysis is essential to leverage the growing availability of driving video data for traffic safety research and accountability attribution in autonomous driving. Crash video analysis is a challenging multitask problem due to the complex spatiotemporal dynamics of crash events in video data and the diverse analytical requirements involved.
